page.title: 19HOME LIFE BOREHAM
page.content: I am Gina my age is eleven and this is my last term at Boreham Primary School.I live in the North of Boreham Parish close to Fords Proving Ground. Work starts there at 8 oclock in the morning, and about 100 cars pour into the car park. Lorries also thunder down our lane sometimes.Sunday is much quieter than weekdays. There are 3 houses in the lane and Holts Farm, which is being renovated, this has been going on for five years! Our house used to be rented to farm labourers. Behind us is a field, where wheat is grown.This may soon be used for the extraction of gravel. I do hope not! That would bring the gravel pits so much nearer to our house. Although when the gravel has been removed it might then be turned into a reservoir.
